propositions.text: The document is titled '腐女重生'.
Chapter information includes '更新时间' (Update Time).
The novel content begins with '第一章' (Chapter One).
In Chapter One, the protagonist's name is '壡壡'.
The protagonist recalls her previous life, where she suffered from illness for fourteen years.
Her suffering ended in 2002, when she was 14 years old.
She has been given new vitality and freedom from her past burdens.
She interacts with her mother, who expresses relief that she is alive.
The protagonist feels a sense of security and believes everything is different from this moment on.
Subsequent chapters ('第二章' through '第一百四十二章') are mentioned.
Most of these subsequent chapters contain uninterpretable garbled text, possibly due to OCR errors or encoding issues.
Each of these chapters is associated with a timestamp and an ID.

concepts.name: 腐女重生
concepts.context: Document title and mentioned in chapter information and prologue.

concepts.name: 重生
concepts.context: Central theme of the narrative, meaning 'rebirth' or 'reincarnation'.

concepts.name: 壡壡
concepts.context: The name of the protagonist in the novel.

concepts.name: 前世
concepts.context: Refers to the protagonist's previous life characterized by illness.

concepts.name: 病痛
concepts.context: Describes the suffering from illness in the protagonist's previous life.

concepts.name: 母亲
concepts.context: The protagonist's mother, who provides comfort and love.

concepts.name: 章节
concepts.context: Represents individual parts of the novel, from '第一章' to '第一百四十二章'.

concepts.name: 乱码
concepts.context: Indicates uninterpretable text within the majority of the novel's chapters.

concepts.name: 时间
concepts.context: Associated with chapter metadata, indicating update times.

concepts.name: ID
concepts.context: Associated with chapter metadata, likely an identifier.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured with a main title, followed by introductory sections (Prologue, Chapter Information), and then the main body of the novel content. The novel content is divided into chapters, with a significant portion being unreadable garbled text.
